data.text: So I bought her to me for fifteen
And I said unto her, Thou shalt abide for me many days; thou shalt not play the harlot, and thou shalt not be for
For the children of Israel shall abide many days without a king, and without a prince, and without a sacrifice, and without an image, and without an ephod, and
